```{r}
library(SummarizedExperiment, quietly=T)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(tibble)

```

```{r}
counts <- read.csv("main_featcount_K562.tsv", sep="\t")
column_data <- read.csv("column_data_K562.tsv", sep="\t")

column_data <- column_data[ order(match(column_data$Experiment.accession, colnames(counts))), ]
rownames(column_data) <- NULL

row_data <- read.csv("rowdata_K562.tsv", sep="\t")
```

```{r}
column_data <- column_to_rownames(column_data, "Experiment.accession")
counts <- column_to_rownames(counts, "Gene.id")
row_data <- column_to_rownames(row_data, "Gene_id")
se <- SummarizedExperiment(counts, colData = column_data, rowData=row_data)
save(se, file = "se_K562.rda")
```

```{r}
rowData(se)
colData(se)
assay(se)
```
